user_query: I'm organizing a company picnic and I want to ensure the food options cater to different dietary needs. Can you provide the nutritional analysis for the proposed menu items? Additionally, I would like some guidelines for organizing a successful company picnic.

TaskList.description: Gather information on proposed menu items including ingredients.
Analyze the nutritional content of the menu items based on the ingredients.
Generate a report of the nutritional analysis highlighting dietary needs (e.g., gluten-free, vegan).
Research and compile guidelines for organizing a successful company picnic.
Create a comprehensive document outlining both the nutritional analysis and the picnic guidelines for distribution.
